quotes.quote: To be stupid, selfish, and have good health are three requirements for happiness, though if stupidity is lacking, all is lost.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote:
Manifest plainness,
Embrace simplicity,
Reduce selfishness,
Have few desires.
quotes.author: Lao-tzu

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is almost a selfish act because of its immense benefits to the one who forgives.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Glory built on selfish principles is shame and guilt.
quotes.author: William Cowper
